description: The story begins 15 years after the demon king was defeated and the world has become peaceful. Kotone, who graduated from school and became a magician, inquired the kingdom-affiliated RPG Real Estate in order to find a new home. In reality, RPG Real Estate was Kotone's place of employment, and together with Fa, a demi-human, the priest Rufuria, and the soldier Rakira, they help support the searches of new homes for the customers with various circumstances.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

She is married to her fellow mangaka [Mitsuhisa Tamura](https://anilist.co/staff/104767).

Daughter of voice actress [Kikuko Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/95195/Kikuko-Inoue).

**Non-anime roles:**
• Soteira - Memento Mori (VG)

__Height:__ 147cm (4'10")

[Profile (Amuleto)](http://amuleto.jp/talents/kinohina.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hinappp8) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hina_Kino) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/木野日菜)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with Amuleto.

On March 21, 2023, she announced on Twitter her marriage to a man not in the entertainment industry.

**Non-Anime Roles**
• Emu Otori (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)
• Griseo (Honkai Impact 3rd)
• Moon Rabbit Cookie (Cookie Run: Kingdom)
• HMS Janus (Azur Lane)
• Sigewinne (Genshin Impact)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/makoto_myzk) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/宮崎誠)

A music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/).

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - Welcome to RPG Real Estate! Room-Searching for the First Time!
Episode 2 - Troublesome Property! First Business Trip to the Dark Lord's Castle
Episode 3 - For Real! Dragon, Ghost, Overwhelming Magic?!
Episode 4 - Always Together! A Property Packed with Pets, Dreams, and Friendship!
Episode 5 - Summer! We Found a Great House for Wearing Swimsuits!
Episode 6 - A Melody for the Grim Reaper!? We're All Friends! Let's Get Along!
Episode 7 - Doors, Doors, Doors! Open the Door to Summer Vacation!
Episode 8 - Wha!? Finding a Dream Home through Fortune Telling!?
Episode 9 - Nyan! One more deal until we meet our goal! Let's make our wishes come true at the Millennium Star Festival!
Episode 10 - Woes of Longevity! I Need a Sturdy House That I Can Live in for a Long Time!
Episode 11 - Fa, Let's Go Home Together
Episode 12 - Thanks, Everyone! RPG Real Estate's New Journey Begins!
